paragraphs: Follow these steps to improve the presentation of our delivery options in your checkout.
If you need help implementing any of these steps, go visit our Checkout tool or contact our Checkout implementation team.
By letting your customers fill in both postal code and street address, they will be presented with the relevant delivery options and pickup points.
Use the standard service name and description text to make sure your customers understand what the delivery options imply.

By offering 7-10 alternatives, your customers will be able to choose the most convenient pickup point. According to Bring Research, customers are more likely to complete the purchase if presented with pickup points located nearby. Therefore, we recommend that you offer parcel lockers. Lockers might also be the preferred pickup point type. We also recommend showing a map to make it easier for your customers to locate the pickup points.

According to Bring Research, customers prefer checkout showing carrier logos to enable them to easily recognize their trusted carriers. For shipments going to consumers in Sweden, Denmark, or another country apart from Norway, use the Bring logo. For shipments going to consumers in Norway, use the Posten logo.
Make the delivery more flexible by adding different value added services. For example:
Alternative delivery time for home delivery parcel. Let the customer choose whether they want the parcel delivered during the day or in the evening.
Show whether the parcel will be delivered by an electric vehicle or not in the checkout. This may help your customers make more sustainable choices.
Følg disse nemme trin for at forbedre præsentationen af vores leveringsmuligheder i din checkout.
Hvis du har brug for hjælp til at implementere nogen af disse trin, kan du besøge vores Checkout tool eller kontakte vores Checkout-implementeringsteam.
Ved at lade dine kunder udfylde både postnummer og adresse, vil de blive præsenteret for de relevante leveringsmuligheder og udleveringssteder.
Brug standard tjenestensnavn og beskrivelsestekst for at sikre, at dine kunder forstår, hvad leveringsmulighederne indebærer.

Ved at tilbyde 7-10 alternativer, vil dine kunder være i stand til at vælge det mest bekvemme udleveringssteder. Ifølge Bring Research er kunderne mere tilbøjelige til at gennemføre købet, hvis de præsenteres for udleveringssteder i nærheden. Derfor anbefaler vi, at du tilbyder pakkeshops og nærboks. Vi anbefaler også at vise et kort for at gøre det nemmere for dine kunder at finde udleveringsstedene.

følge Bring Research foretrækker kunderne, at kassen viser logoer, så de nemt kan genkende deres foretrukne forsendelsesleverandør. For pakker, der skal til slutkunder i Norge, skal du bruge Postens logo. For pakker, der går til slutkunder i andre lande, skal du bruge Bring-logoet.
Gør leveringen mere fleksibel for dine kunder, ved at tilbyde forskellige værdiskabende tjenester, f.eks:
Alternativ leveringstid for Home delivery parcel. Lad kunden vælge, om de vil have pakken leveret i løbet af dagen eller om aftenen.

Ved at bruge vores miljøtekst og vores miljøikon kan du allerede ved checkouten vise kunderne, om deres pakke bliver leveret med elbil. Dette giver dine kunder mulighed for at træffe mere bæredygtige valg.
